trans-unit.target: 适用于 .NET 平台的发布服务器

trans-unit.source: The target framework to publish for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的目标框架。必须在项目文件中指定目标框架。

trans-unit.source: The output directory to place the published artifacts in.
trans-unit.target: 要放置已发布项目的输出目录。

trans-unit.source: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.
trans-unit.target: 指向目标清单文件的路径，该文件包含要通过发布步骤执行的包的列表。

trans-unit.source: Do not build the project before publishing. Implies --no-restore.
trans-unit.target: 发布之前不要生成项目。Implies --no-restore.

trans-unit.source: The target runtime to publish the application for. The default is to publish a framework-dependent application without an executable.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的目标运行时。创建自包含部署时使用此项。 默认操作为发布依赖框架的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The configuration to publish for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.
trans-unit.target: 要发布的配置。大多数项目的默认值是 "Debug"。

trans-unit.source: The mode to use when publishing the application. The 'self-contained' mode publishes the application with the .NET Core runtime. The 'fx-dependent' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent. If a target runtime is specified, it is published with an executable. The 'fx-dependent-no-exe' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent without an executable. The default is 'fx-dependent-no-exe' when a target runtime is not specified. The default is 'self-contained' when a target runtime is specified.
trans-unit.target: The mode to use when publishing the application. The 'self-contained' mode publishes the application with the .NET Core runtime. The 'fx-dependent' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent. If a target runtime is specified, it is published with an executable. The 'fx-dependent-no-exe' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent without an executable. The default is 'fx-dependent-no-exe' when a target runtime is not specified. The default is 'self-contained' when a target runtime is specified.

trans-unit.source: The '--mode' and '--self-contained' options cannot be used together. Specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: The '--mode' and '--self-contained' options cannot be used together. Specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: The specified publish mode '{0}' is not supported.
trans-unit.target: The specified publish mode '{0}' is not supported.
